title: Deals: Sony Xperia 1 IV pre-order discount, Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 $200 off, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are now up for grabs with a pre-order promotion going live on the all-new Sony Xperia 1 IV. That’s alongside a chance to save $200 on Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 and get a Powerbeats Pro at $180. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Sony Xperia 1 IV pre-order discount, Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3 $200 off, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Ahead of launch, the new Sony Xperia 1 IV is up for pre-order with a free pair of the brand's XM4 ANC earbuds thrown in, plus more.
